nodes.text: A Gamorrean fighter fought another fighter in a fighting pit around 9 ABY. Gor Koresh bet on this fighter to win the fight but the fighter wasn't doing good. The fighter was on the ground and was going to get finished until Koresh shot the other fighter and then held a Mandalorian named Din Djarin at gunpoint for his armor. Djarin then fought Koresh and his allies, while the Gamorrean fighter attempted to jump on Djarin but failed then landed on and broke a table.
